Definition at line 156 of file portableOS.h.

char SystemsBiologyWorkbench::SBWOS::PathSeparator (    )  [inline, static]
 

returns the character used to seperate paths to JAR files in a string.

(This is not actually the standard separator character under Linux, but this method is only used for breaking up lists of JAR files.)

Returns:
path seperator character.

Definition at line 174 of file portableOS.cpp.

References ThrowError.

void SBWOS::ThrowError (  int    error )  [static]
 

Throws an SBWRawException * corresponding to the given error code.

Exceptions:
SBWRawException  * corresponding to the given error code. On Linux this method is for situations where a system call does not set errno, but instead returns a number that represents a system error code.

Definition at line 133 of file portableOS.cpp.

void SBWOS::ThrowError (    )  [static]
 

Throws an exception for a system error.

It extracts the system error message corresponding to the last error raised by the system.

Exceptions:
SBWRawException  , containing the system error information
